definition[0]: to make someone feel better when they are feeling sad or disappointed
example[0]: No one could console her when Peter died.
example[1]: She consoled herself with the fact that no one else had done well in the exam either.
example[2]: He consoled himself that he would see Kate again soon.
definition[1]: a flat board that contains the controls for a machine, piece of electrical equipment, computer etc
definition[2]: a special cupboard for a television, computer etc
